CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |
| DSeBT |

Note:

* PCDTBT stands for "polycrystalline donor-acceptor blend thermoplastic"
* PCDSeBT stands for "polycrystalline donor-acceptor blend thermoplastic with selenophene"
* DSeBT stands for "diselenienylbenzothiadiazole"

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name" in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |

The entity "DSeBT" does not clearly refer to a material name, as it is a monomer that is used to synthesize the material PCDSeBT. Therefore, it has been excluded from the table.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PSCs |
| PCDSeBT |
| DSeBT |

Explanation:

* PCDTBT (Poly[N-9''-heptyl-N-9''-phenyl-9H-carbazole-2,7-yl]-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole)) is a polymer used in solar cells.
* PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) are a type of solar cell that uses a polymer as the photovoltaic material.
* PCDSeBT (Poly[N-9''-heptyl-N-9''-phenyl-9H-carbazole-2,7-yl]-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole-selenophene)) is a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT.
* DSeBT (Diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) is a monomer that alternates with a 2,7-carbazole unit in the synthesis of PCDSeBT.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that refer to "Value of material property":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |
| DSeBT |

Explanation:

* PCDTBT (Poly[N-9''-heptyl-N-9''-phenyl-9H-carbazole-2,7-yl]-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole)) is a polymer used in solar cells and has a specific value of material property.
* PCDSeBT (Poly[N-9''-heptyl-N-9''-phenyl-9H-carbazole-2,7-yl]-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole-selenophene)) is a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT and has a specific value of material property.
* DSeBT (Diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) is a monomer that alternates with a 2,7-carbazole unit in the synthesis of PCDSeBT and has a specific value of material property.
